data.title: Playlists

Program Descriptions Wednesday February 6th Echoes Program 1306C New Music: Diane Arkenstone & Gandalf We enter the land of Hobbits, wizards and dwarves with new music by Diane Arkenstone and the latest by the Austrian synthesist who takes his name from the Tolkien wizard, Gandalf. Program Descriptions Tuesday February 5th Echoes Program 1306B Echoes at the Grammys We take a look at the Grammy nominees from the Echoes Zone including artists Loreena McKennitt, Moby, M83 and Anoushka Shankar. They may not be on the TV show, but they’ll be on the red carpet of Echoes. Start Time Group Name Song…

Program Descriptions Monday February 4th Echoes Program 1306A Echoes CD of the Month Ulrich Schnauss – A Long Way to Fall Ulrich Schnauss was one of the signpost electronic musicians of the 21st centuries first decade. Now he’s just released his first CD of the teens, a gorgeous work of melodic ambient spaces called A…

Program Descriptions Thursday January 24th Echoes Program 1304D New Music: Eberhard Weber & Devendra Banhart New music from German bassist Eberhard Weber whose new album Résumé is excerpted from live performances he played with Jan Garbarek over the course of 25 years.
